article: los angeles mayor antonio villaraigosa on wednesday appealed to u.s. attorney general alberto gonzales for additional funding and prosecutorial help to combat gang-related crime , kicking off what officials say will be a year-long push to tackle one of the region 's most intractable problems .
abstract: los angeles seeks federal help to fight gangs
